alert.note: Alert for Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Randall and southwestern Potter Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bushland, or 12 miles west of Amarillo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amarillo and Bushland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
